Title: Two Toned Mock Two Piece Evening Dress

----

Sku: CR757

----

Price:

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 12, 6, 10, 8, 14, 4

Colors: black-white

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: CR757-black-white-two-toned-mock-two-piece-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: Two toned gown is color blocked with opposites on the bodice and skirt giving an architectural style with a chic modern look. The form fitting gown has a sheer panel at the midriff and the bust line. The back of the bodice features a sheer V-shape and the two toned fabric stripes the skirt that falls to the floor.
